strings:
ExpressVPN Select ExpressVPN Server Connect ExpressVPN ExpressVPN Settings Management IP Address Management Port Additional Arguments ExpressVPN Configuration Script Use sudo when running ExpressVPN Password is required Advanced Debug Show ExpressVPN Location Disconnect ExpressVPN
Select ExpressVPN Server Enter a name for ExpressVPN connection ExpressVPN An ExpressVPN connection already exists with that name. Overwrite? Selection cancelled. Selection failed. You must specify a name for the ExpressVPN connection. Are you sure you want to delete this ExpressVPN configuration? Delete cancelled. No ExpressVPN configurations exist to delete. o An existing ExpressVPN instance appears to be running. Disconnect it? An error has occurred whilst trying to connect ExpressVPN Enter your sudo password Select ExpressVPN server to connect Disconnect ExpressVPN
IP: %s; Country: %s Stopped ExpressVPN connection: %s Started ExpressVPN connection: %s
